lines.text:
[about Lester]
The man is a psychopathic killer.
Don't impose your values on me, Sam.
Ginger, what are we going to do now?
[walks over and sits down by Cherry 2000, opens thermos, hands Cherry 2000 a sandwich]

[to Cherry to get her off the plane]
Cherry, I want you to get me a Pepsi.

[to Randa just before he shoots her in the head - offscreen]
You need to work on your personality.
